name: Amanda's Sticker Book
description:
Enjoy a fun match-3 puzzle game for kids and adults alike! Put your matching skills to the test as you swap stickers and use power-ups to clear each puzzle.
Amanda is counting on your match-3 talents to make her dreams come true and win the annual sticker book contest and a trip to Hawaii!


- 79 levels to complete
- More than 20 upgrades
- Five rooms to explore
- Three useful tools to learn and use
- More than a dozen elements to gather
